attributes.action: Don’t put forward noise cameras on our roads!
attributes.additional_details: The government wants to introduce a Noise detecting ANPR camera which fines you for having a loud exhaust, this is currently in trial and could be seen in use in the next year, according to their own statements and sources like the Sun news paper, the evening standard and others confirming.
attributes.background: The people want to freely express themselves, we are allowed to dress the way we want, we are allowed to eat the way we want, why can’t we dress our cars as we like them? A loud exhaust is not a health and safety risk. This government already makes driving a pain. We do not need a Noise Camera.
